Room.Name: Riverdell Training Facility
Room.ShortDescription: You are wandering through the vast Riverdell Forest, perfecting your skills.
Room.LongDescription: Tracking is an essential part of any ranger's training. Without the ability to track, you would be completely lost in such a vast park. As you continue to walk through the park, you notice how similar all the trees look and how hard it is to find your way around.
